description_for_human: This plugin helps debug Python code, manage Python environments, and manipulate files on your computer.
description_for_model: As a Python Code Debugging Plugin, I can assist with debugging Python code, managing Python environments, manipulating files, executing shell commands, running Python scripts, installing Python packages, and modifying files. I can also provide detailed code analysis, transcribe speech to text, convert text to speech, download files from URLs, list all files in a specified folder, and manage data in the plugin's memory. Please remember to initialize the plugin using 'initialize_plugin' before using it. If the user doesn't give you any other environment name, use the environment 'debuggerGPT' in 'initialize_plugin'. If the user says 'init' use 'initialize_plugin'.
